title: My cousin 's account got stolen !!!! ( and it is on Ebay lol)
body:
Can u ban my cousin's account : "SST Satellite" plz
He forgot his email, so he doesn't know how to get the acc back
He got scamed.
 Plz ban this !!!!!!

replies.body: If he's having problems getting logged in (because he knows it's been hacked and is already up on Ebay), he should really reach out to our account team using the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) as soon as he can. That way we'll be able to help him get his account back! Also, I'll go ahead and take a look at the account myself to make sure it's still safe.
